Daily 10 Smart Drill

A balanced set across core domains to keep skills sharp.

  1. What is the primary purpose of asking a Tanium Question?
    • To schedule software deployments
    • To retrieve real-time endpoint data
    • To manage user accounts
    • To back up Tanium Server
    Domain: Asking Questions · Difficulty: Beginner
  2. Which component interprets natural-language questions into sensor queries?
    • Package Service
    • Question Parser
    • Action Broker
    • Reporting Engine
    Domain: Asking Questions · Difficulty: Intermediate
  3. What is the main benefit of Dynamic Computer Groups when refining targets?
    • They store historical answers
    • They automatically update membership based on criteria
    • They deploy packages automatically
    • They disable sensors by default
    Domain: Refining Questions & Targeting · Difficulty: Intermediate
  4. Which boolean operator combination best expresses 'Windows endpoints with Chrome OR Firefox installed and not domain controllers'?
    • AND only
    • (Chrome OR Firefox) AND Windows AND NOT DomainController
    • OR only
    • NOT only
    Domain: Refining Questions & Targeting · Difficulty: Advanced
  5. What is the safest way to deploy a package to production endpoints?
    • Deploy to all endpoints immediately
    • Test on a pilot group, then staged rollout
    • Disable approvals
    • Run at peak business hours
    Domain: Taking Action · Difficulty: Intermediate
  6. Which setting helps prevent unintended package execution on critical systems?
    • Disable confirmation prompts
    • Require approval for actions
    • Enable random execution
    • Increase timeout only
    Domain: Taking Action · Difficulty: Beginner
  7. Which console area provides quick access to commonly used modules?
    • System Settings
    • Navigation sidebar
    • Action approval queue
    • Sensor editor
    Domain: Navigation and Basic Module Functions · Difficulty: Beginner
  8. What workflow helps new users learn module layouts efficiently?
    • Explore one module at a time and use built-in help
    • Change tenant settings
    • Disable tooltips
    • Use only keyboard shortcuts
    Domain: Navigation and Basic Module Functions · Difficulty: Beginner
  9. Which output formats are commonly supported for exporting question results?
    • CSV and JSON
    • MP3 and WAV
    • PNG and JPG
    • DOCX only
    Domain: Report Generation and Data Export · Difficulty: Beginner
  10. What practice helps maintain data integrity when building reports?
    • Mix unrelated sensors arbitrarily
    • Document filters and include timestamps
    • Avoid including metadata
    • Export screenshots only
    Domain: Report Generation and Data Export · Difficulty: Intermediate
